fund(uint256,uint256).details: Finalize funding after the book has transferred tokens in.

initialize(address,address,address,strin.details: Initialize a newly cloned futures instance. Called once by the FuturesBook.

enterAsLong(address).notice: Counterparty enters; fill only the vacant role based on maker intent.

exercise(uint256,address).notice: Cash settlement: linear magnitude, book transfers strike between parties.

reclaim(address).notice: If unexercised after expiry, the short (maker) can reclaim funded assets and end the position.

resolve().notice: Resolve the settlement price from the oracle at/after expiry.
